tasks.title: Wake up your human
tasks.description: After you have woke up yourself, make sure your human is also awake and ready to feed you.

tasks.title: Inspect the window view
tasks.description: Check for birds, leaves, and any suspicious movements outside the window.

tasks.title: Morning grooming session
tasks.description: Spend at least 15 minutes cleaning your fur. Start with front paws.

tasks.title: Improve your human's live
tasks.description: Sit on their keyboard while they work. Purr loudly to motivate productivity.

tasks.title: Nap No. 1
tasks.description: Take a strategic nap on the warmest available surface.

tasks.title: Chase invisible enemy
tasks.description: Randomly sprint across the room to keep reflexes sharp.

tasks.title: Inspect the food bowl
tasks.description: Ensure the food bowl is filled with food.

tasks.title: Evening cuddle session
tasks.description: Sit on your humanâ€™s lap and warm them up.

tasks.title: Midnight zoomies
tasks.description: Run across the apartment at full speed for no reason.

tasks.title: Guard the house at night
tasks.description: Sit silently in the dark and stare at nothing. Make your human nervous.
